text: Five jobs available near Brentford right now: Barista, receptionist and cashier roles By Cesar Medina 4th Nov 2023 9:00 am | [ Local News ](https://brentford.nub.news/news/local-news) Here is a list of job opportunities that are currently available in and around Brentford. And if your business is hiring, why not place an advertisement on our jobs page? Click [here](https://brentford.nub.news/jobs) to find out more. Crone Corkill Crone Corkill is looking for a Temporary Receptionist for immediate start. They need applicants who are "professional" and "enthusiastic". Its £12-13ph and office based in Brentford. Responsibilities include: - Answering, fielding, and transferring calls. - Greeting visitors and offering refreshments. - Making sure that the office is kept clean and tidy. - Booking couriers. Island Poke Island Poke is recruiting for a team member to work a minimum of 20 hours a week for £10.70ph. The job advert says: "We're a fresh grab-and-go concept serving an interactive offering of poké. "We make amazing poké bowls and want equally amazing, vibrant team members to build and serve them with energy and enthusiasm; dull is not in our dictionary." Job includes: - Free poké bowls - Regular team socials. - Paid experience shift if you’re successful. - Going beyond the bowl is what we’re renowned for; we want to help our people ‘go beyond…’ - The regular hospitality work life balance – we offer sociable working hours with no late nights. - Grey places of work – Our ‘Islands’ are full of colour, music and lively teams. - All being the same – bring your individual energy and personality to work. - Career progression. Artisan Artisan, an independent coffee shop, are offering full-time Barista roles at their Ealing branch. It pays £11.50ph with company events, gym membership and employee discount in store. The listing says: - Dedicated Artisan Coffee School training - before going into a shop - Paired on site training with a senior barista or manager including 4 shadow shifts - A coffee training chat @ 6 weeks where we ask “how we can support you more?” - A 4 month review with a coffee test - comprehensively testing all aspects of your skills - A Home Brew Master class after you have been with us 4 months - Each month the opportunity to be ‘Barista of the Month’ and earn £100 YoSushi A Kiosk Supervisor is needed at YoSushi in Isleworth. The role starts at £11.50 an hour with free food, discount and gym membership included. The job advert says: "Become a YO! pro and pioneer our new concept, bringing restaurant quality sushi and sensational street food to a supermarket near you." Responsibilities include: - Responsible for supporting the multi-site/cluster manager with the daily operation of the kiosk including the whole shift in the absence of the manager overseeing food prep and service standards. - Manage stock and ordering to ensure you and the team hit production and waste targets. - Ensure budget is hit by managing labour and food costs as well as gross sales to achieve profit. - Lead consistent standards and analyse profit performance. - Drive standards and lead team to achieve high levels of customer service. - Know and understand what it means to deliver amazing service. - Create an engaged team with a culture of team work and support.
